name: .PMFX File Extension
summary: Learn about .PMFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A PMFX file is a disk image created by Eassos DiskGenius, a data recovery and disk management program. It stores a complete copy of a storage device or partition, including its file system, data, and structure. The PMFX format is used for backup, recovery, and forensic purposes, allowing users to preserve an exact copy of a diskâ€™s contents.

content: IT professionals, system administrators, and advanced users typically use DiskGenius to back up entire drives, recover data from failing disks, or clone systems for deployment. They may also use the software for digital forensics, where preserving an exact copy of a drive is required for analysis.
DiskGenius creates PMFX files when a user:
Right-clicks the disk and chooses Backup Disk To Image File.

instructions: You can open PMFX files with Eassos DiskGenius in Windows. To restore a PMFX file:
Right-click the disk and choose Restore Image File to Disk.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
